---
title: Renew physical cards
---

# Renew physical cards

If you want the renewed physical card to be shipped to a different address than the original one, you must use the `confirmPhysicalCardRenewal` mutation. This mutation allows you to confirm the renewal and specify a new delivery address. If your cardholder doesn't want to renew, cancel the card before the 8-week mark.

:::caution Delivery address
You must call this mutation at least 8 weeks before the card expiration date, otherwise the renewed card will be sent to the original address used for the first card.
:::

:::tip Prerequisites
1. Confirm that the card is in `ToRenew` status before callign this mutation.
1. Verify the new delivery physical card address with your cardholder.
:::

## Guide {#guide}

1. Call the `confirmPhysicalCardRenewal` mutation.
2. Add the `cardId` for the physical card you're renewing (line 2).
3. Add the updated delivery `address` for the renewed physical card.
4. Add the `ConfirmPhysicalCardRenewalSuccessPayload`, including any information you'd like to review.
5. Add rejections (not shown).

<DeliveryAddressInfo />

## Mutation {#mutation}

ðŸ”Ž [Open the mutation in API Explorer](https://explorer.swan.io?%3D%3D&tab=api)

```graphql {2-3} showLineNumbers
mutation RenewPhysicalCard {
  confirmPhysicalCardRenewal(
    input: {
      cardId: "$YOUR_CARD_ID"
      address: { addressLine1: "10 Rue de la Paix", city: "Paris", postalCode: "75000", country: "FRA" }
    }
  ) {
    ... on ConfirmPhysicalCardRenewalSuccessPayload {
      __typename
      physicalCard {
        expiryDate
        statusInfo {
          status
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Payload {#payload}

The payload confirms that the physical card expires on 09/28 (line 8), and the physical card renewal status is `ToRenew` (line 9).

```json {8} showLineNumbers
{
  "data": {
    "confirmPhysicalCardRenewal": {
      "__typename": "ConfirmPhysicalCardRenewalSuccessPayload",
      "physicalCard": {
        "expiryDate": "09/21",
        "statusInfo": {
          "status": "ToRenew"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Digital and virtual cards {#digital-virtual-cards}
When a physical card is canceled, digital cards linked to the physical card will also be canceled.
Virtual cards will not be affected.

:::tip 
Swan recommends only digitizing virtual cards for a safer experience.
:::

Refer to the guides for [digital](../digital/guide-cancel.mdx) and [virtual](../virtual/guide-cancel.mdx) cards if you need to cancel those as well.
